error.signature: Route 53 health check failed: endpoint returned non-2xx/3xx status

verdict.summary: Route 53 health check reports endpoint as unhealthy due to connectivity, response code, or response content issues.

dead_ends.action: Disable the health check to stop failover
dead_ends.why_fails: Disabling health checks removes DNS failover protection, routing traffic to dead endpoints

dead_ends.action: Lower the failure threshold to be less sensitive
dead_ends.why_fails: Lower thresholds mask real problems; users may hit the unhealthy endpoint

workarounds.action: Ensure the endpoint security group allows inbound from Route 53 health checker IP ranges
workarounds.how: Allow inbound from Route 53 health check IPs (published in ip-ranges.json) on the health check port

workarounds.action: Verify the health check endpoint returns 2xx/3xx and matches the string search pattern
workarounds.how: Test the endpoint directly: curl -v ENDPOINT_URL and verify response code and body match health check config

leads_to.condition: Health check failure triggers failover but secondary origin also has issues

frequently_confused_with.distinction: CloudFront origin error is about CDN-to-origin connectivity; Route 53 health check is about DNS-level endpoint monitoring
